title: MINION RAN$OM
lyrics:
Hold OOOOoon bruh
Im not starting yet
I got yellow, I got purple, what you want?
Hop outside a Rocket and hop in a Grumobile
I know I'm boutta blow-oh-whoa-oh, I ain’t purple
They try to take my yellow, I take they bananas for ransom
I know that I'm yellow
They see gru blowing up, now they say they want some
I got two twin fart guns, turn you to a dancer
I got two purple minions, leave 'em on the banner
And I got two thick minions, wanna love the gang, yeah
Gru got good , Gru got bad, what you want?
The Grucci or Bananaiaga, Gruey and Gruttion
She know I got the Lucy, Gruda when I hit Milan
I needed a me a banana I need me the Moon
I started from the villiany, you could see the way I taunt
I want the diamond , I want that fo my minions
The Macho’s they tryna stop me 'cause they hate the place Gru from
But them villians don't know me, they just know the place Gru from
I got lots of Minions tryna pull up to my place
But you ain't want Gru so just get up out the race
They all up in Gru's inbox, so I know they want a place
I know they want my downfall, lil' Macho are you late?
I got yellow, I got purple, what you want?
Hop outside a rocket and hop in a grumobile
I know I'm boutta blow-oh-whoa-oh, I ain't purple
They try to take my yellow, I take they banana for ransom
I know that I’m yellow
They see gru blowing up, now they say they want some
I got two twin fart guns, turn you to a dancer
I see two purple minions, leave ’em on the banner
And I got two thick minions, wanna love the gang, yeah
I go' purp
I got yellow, I got purple, what you want?
Hop outside a rocket and hop in a grumobile
I know I’m boutta blow-oh-whoa-oh, I ain't purple
They try to take my yellow, I take they bananas for ransom
I know that I'm yellow
They see GRU blowing up, now they say they want some
I got two twin fart guns, turn you to a dancer
I see two twin purple minions, leave 'em on the banner
And I got two thick minions, wanna love the gang, yeah
